name: CuteSquare
description:
Let's play new puzzles with cute characters!
Operation of only swipe blocks in 3 directions.

------------
How to play
------------
· Swipe the block in any direction of "left, right, down".
· Blocks are erased when three identical symbols and colors are collected.
· Be careful not to fill the board.
· When you get into a pinch, let's use the character's skill.

------------
Production
------------
AOTAKA STUDIO

Game Planning, Programming, Motion & Effects
TOKUDA TAKASHI

Character Design & Arts, Graphic Design
TOKUDA AOI
